title: Arrived at Bryn Shander, ruins sighted
Defeated Vellynne and the Twisted Darlings
Arrived at the Lost Spire
notes: Descent beneath the black mountain began.

title: Returned to Easthaven after Emperor Penguin raid
notes: Preparing to pursue clues to the Lost Spire of Netheril.

title: Cave of the Berserkers
notes: Defeated the Keraptis Clone and retrieved Frostrazor.

title: Side Quests to Gather Intel
notes: Completed minor quests about Frostmaiden's followers.

title: Frostmaiden’s Followers and Frost Druid Cults
notes: Defeated corrupted frost druids, uncovering the Whispering Willow Wood.

title: Arcane Brotherhood
notes: Uncovered clues about Pengu, Auril, and the Candle of the Dark One.

title: Investigate the Duergar Conspiracy
notes: Stopped the duergar plot in Icewind Dale.

title: A Beautiful Mine (Termalaine)
notes: Resolved the mine’s corruption; town stable.

title: Foaming Mugs (Bryn Shander)
notes: Discovered the Potion of Giant Size in a smuggling operation.

title: The Easthaven Ferry
notes: Ensured ferry operation and resolved duergar threat.

title: The White Lady’s Ghost
notes: Laid the spirit to rest and found the Ring of Invisibility.

title: Toil and Trouble
notes: Retrieved the magical cauldron from the Frost Giants.
